description.value:
Usable with a slingshot. Though slingshots can fire any small stone, spherical projectiles are preferable for their consistent accuracy. Common materials for purpose-made slingshot ammo are iron, lead, glass, or clay

This piece of ammunition grants you a bonus to hit and to damage, the bonus of which is determined by the rarity of the ammunition. However, once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.
